h1_title: Chapter 4 Secret - Purple Cloud Mountain Walkthrough
content: A very tough boss awaits you just up the path, so this is a good time to make sure you're properly stocked up on supplies have and crafted or upgraded (and make use of the Shrine's store to buy extra anti-miasma powder!).

The content is as follows:
A very tough boss awaits you just up the path, so this is a good time to make sure you're properly stocked up on supplies have and crafted or upgraded (and make use of the Shrine's store to buy extra anti-miasma powder!).
